ygData.subject: Re: Has this ever happened to you?? Thanks.........
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the info/responds... This was really worrying me. I believe in playing fair no matter what. It s only a game to me , one I really enjoy but still
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the info/responds... This was really worrying me. I
believe in playing fair no matter what. It's only a game to me , one
I really enjoy but still only a game. so..........Besides CP where
would I go to hunt and group to level up a 24th level Shaman? ( I
really would like to start makeing those potions at 25th level) I
level slow because I don't play but an hour or so at a time but I am
getting there..
I am on the server that starts with an X (the longer name not the 3
leter one).. this shows you how much I play , I don't even know the
name of the server I am on...lol

In service..

Frezslice the shaman 24th circle of the north
